title: What's the point in playing Annie ADC anymore?
body: When you can just play {{champion:119}} with {{item:3812}} and do everything Annie ADC does but better?

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=L Psy Congroo,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=cU5zErJx,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-06-13T21:35:02.731+0000)

> What's the point in playing Annie ADC ~~anymore~~? 

fixed
? Annie ADC? Did I miss something?
This is a sarcastic post mocking all the random QQ over tiny meta shifts. I think.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=cU5zErJx,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-06-13T22:35:15.171+0000)
>
> This is a sarcastic post mocking all the random QQ over tiny meta shifts. I think.

Yeah it's this though I don't fully understand cause it feels like he's saying why not always play draven unless it's the sarcasm plus draven joke cause draven is draven and draven is best because draven in the league of draven

> [{quoted}](name=LightIsMyPath,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=cU5zErJx,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-06-13T21:38:24.557+0000)
>
> ? Annie ADC? Did I miss something?

Annie ADC is legit, she gets 40% damage reduction every 4 seconds from her E that ALSO returns damage, so you don't even have to buy Thornmail. Her auto attack range is above average, and farming is easy with Q. And what other ADC has such amazing self-peel with a built-in stun?
O.o I really hope you are trolling me xD
